duties_responsibilities.duty: Own development and execution of technology strategy, designs solutions that meet customer needs and beat competition.
Develop strong relationships with sales team, internal engineering, and key technical customer contacts and leverage to Zebra's advantage.
Create and deliver high-impact solution presentations, develop and execute technology strategies with minimal input from manager for a higher level of financial responsibility.
Promote solutions encompassing a wide range of products or services and technologies; as required, leverage relationships with other business units and/or external partners to deliver solutions.
Develop strong relationships with key decision makers and influencers, lead technical presentations on Zebra products and services and their use in the customer business environment.
Define project customer interface and assists teams on largest deals.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in a technical field or equivalent experience
